venue.address_1: 212 Hampshire St., 212 Hampshire St., Inman Sq., Cambridge
venue.name: Ryles Jazz Club

item.description: The MARC ROSSI GROUP, with guest Indian vocalist Geetha Ramanathan Bennett will be performing at RYLES JAZZ CLUB, on WEDNESDAY APRIL 10th, as part of the Ryles 'World Wednesday' series. We'll be playing music from our critically acclaimed CDs Hidden Mandala and Mantra Revealed, as well as some new material. $10, all ages. Hope to see you there!
item.name: MARC ROSSI GROUP Live @ Ryles
